mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO website_tb (name, type, url, status, remark, update_date, admin_id) VALUES (#{name}, #{type}, #{url}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{updateDate}, #{adminId})
mapper.update: UPDATE website_tb SET name=#{name}, type=#{type}, url=#{url}, status=#{status}, remark=#{remark}, update_date=#{updateDate}, admin_id=#{adminId} WHERE website_id=#{websiteId}
mapper.select: SELECT website_id, name, type, url, status, remark, update_date, admin_id FROM website_tb WHERE website_id=#{websiteId}
SELECT website_id, name, type, url, status, remark, update_date, admin_id FROM website_tb ORDER BY ${orderName} ${orderWay} LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
SELECT website_id, name, type, url, status, remark, update_date, admin_id FROM website_tb WHERE admin_id=#{adminId} ORDER BY ${orderName} ${orderWay} LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
SELECT count(website_id) FROM website_tb WHERE admin_id=#{adminId}
